text: Marco Antonio Rigau Gaztambide (born in Ponce, Puerto Rico) served as an Associate Justice of the Puerto Rico Supreme Court from 1961 to 1981. He was a member of Fi Sigma Alfa fraternity. ==References== Category:Associate Justices of the Supreme Court of Puerto Rico Category:Civil servants from Ponce Category:Puerto Rican lawyers
title: Marco Rigau Gaztambide
